input: Write a short biography of Sean Penn.
output:
Sean Penn was born in 1960 in Santa Monica, California. He is the son of actor Leo Penn and actress Eileen Ryan. He has two brothers, Chris and Michael. He attended Santa Monica High School and graduated in 1978. He then attended Santa Monica College and the University of California, Santa Barbara.

Penn began his acting career in 1981. He has appeared in many films, including Fast Times at Ridgemont High, The Falcon and the Snowman, The Indian Runner, Dead Man Walking, Hurlyburly, The Crossing Guard, She's So Lovely, The Game, The Thin Red Line, I Am Sam, Mystic River, 21 Grams, and Milk. He has also appeared in the television series The Wonder Years, The Larry Sanders Show, and Deadwood.

Penn has won two Academy Awards for his performances in Mystic River and Milk. He has also won a Golden Globe Award for Mystic River and a Screen Actors Guild Award for Milk.
